item.title: Teach the Controversy: mempoolfullrbf
item.description: What is transaction replacement? (00:00) So, let’s go start off. What is transaction replacement? And maybe not the best screen, but this is a screenshot of the Bitcoin wallet, Blue Wallet, and it shows off transaction replacement very nicely. I have a transaction, I got rid of $25 worth of Bitcoin, and I can do two things, I can go bump the fee or cancel the transaction, and if any of you guys played around with it, it does what it expects, it increases the fee or it cancels it.

item.title: Replace-by-Fee Bug (CVE-2021-31876)
item.description: Intro Aaron van Wirdum: 00:00:08 Live from (?), Aruba and Utrecht, the Netherlands, this is The Van Wirdum Sjorsnado. Sjors Provoost: 00:00:15 Hello, welcome, and listeners, sorry for the maybe not perfect sound quality, because we have to make do with the remote recording. Aaron van Wirdum: 00:00:24 Yeah, for the second time since we’re making our show my laptop broke, so here I am on my phone. Sjors Provoost: 00:00:32
